New Records: Sunil Chhetri is set to play his 150th Senior International match for the Indian National Team against Afghanistan, having made 149 appearances and scored 93 goals in his career
Key Match Events: The match against Afghanistan marks Sunil Chhetri's 150th Senior International appearance
Pre-Game Insights: Sunil Chhetri's milestone 150th match is a significant event in Indian football history
Post-Match Reflections: The AIFF will felicitate Sunil Chhetri for his remarkable achievement in post-match celebrations
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled to be held in Guwahati, Assam
